post:
Hi all,

Tonight's offer, along with **[the previous one](http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/35693/host-nun-1-gb-openvz-haiqing-in-vegas-1-99-month-or-19-year-free-upgrades)**, is a continuation of our **[1 Year Anniversary Sale](http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/32959/host-nun-1-year-anniversary-sale-1-gb-6-gb-openvz-bhikkhuni-sangha-in-vegas-from-2-49-month)**. We have room for a few more Haiqings at this juncture, so, without further ado...

![](http://img.bs/i/406b075b9855d4e7.png)

**The Offer**

Two choices. Either 1) **[Haiqing for $19 / year](https://abbey.hostnun.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=68)** or 2) negotiate your own specs and pricing. If you choose the latter, the only rule is that you must negotiate in this thread rather than backchannel!

**What's included with a 'Haiqing'?**

1 GB RAM, 1 GB Vswap, 1 TB Bandwidth, 60 GB RAID protected HDD, and 2 IPv4.

**What are the node specs?**

A mixture of Dual Intel Xeon L5630 & L5639 CPUs in Vegas/Fiberhub. RAID 1 HDD on the former and RAID 10 HDD on the latter. PM for a test IP.

**Automatic provisioning?**

If the payment is successful, your VPS will be created instantly. We accept more than 30 different currencies via PayPal. 40 day money back guarantee with no questions asked.

**Additional IPs?**

$1 / month per IPv4. IPv6 is free.

**Backups?**

Daily remote backups are $1 / month.

**cPanel?**

We can provide a cPanel/WHM VPS Optimized License for $16.99 / month.

**Managed/Unmanaged?**

The service is unmanaged, but we may attempt to provide 'best effort' support depending on the complexity of the problem.

**You don't have the OS I want!**

Let us know what you want and we'll try to make it available for you.

**Dear sir, I will have you know that the content of your website is more offensive than the movie Sister Act**

If you would like to submit a complaint along these lines, please consider **[reading](http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/comment/454847/#Comment_454847)** **[some](http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/comment/489637/#Comment_489637)** **[of](http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/comment/530563/#Comment_530563)** **[our](http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/comment/531568/#Comment_531568)** **[responses](http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/comment/532560/#Comment_532560)** **[in](http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/comment/595501/#Comment_595501)** **[previous](http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/comment/595925/#Comment_595925)** **[offers](http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/comment/756285/#Comment_756285)** **[first](http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/comment/756389/#Comment_756389)**. If you're looking to criticize Host Nun without having tried the service, we recommend consulting @W1V_Lee for expert advice. We are interested in and open to all 'aesthetic' criticisms.

![](http://img.bs/i/8c3a59bfd.jpg)

**As always, thank you for your interest and God Bless!** ![](http://img.bs/i/89a51.png)
